title: Advanced Windows Care V2 Professional (Promotional 1 year subscr
description:
From an article on mydigitallife.info "Advanced WindowsCare Professional Edition (IOBit) Free Account License Code":

"Advanced WindowsCare Professional Edition by IOBit.com is a Windows system utility to maintain superior PC health and protects, cleans, configures, and optimizes the Windows PC. Advanced WindowsCare Professional Edition provides an always-on, automated, all-in-one PC Healthcare Service with anti-spyware, privacy protection, performance tune-ups, and system cleaning capabilities.

Features of Advanced WindowsCare Professional include:

    * An "Install It and Forget It" feature that works automatically and quietly in the background on your computer.
    * The ability to constantly keep your computer safe, error-free and running at its top speed and optimum performance.
    * Keeping your PC error-free and running more smoothly than ever.
    * Fix registry errors.
    * Remove spyware and adware.
    * Immunize security threats.
    * Clean temporary files.
    * Optimize Windows startup.
    * Protect privacy.
    * Speed up system.
    * Repair core system.
    * 1-click solution.
    * System tune up.
    * Automatic care in the background.
    * Automatic high speed updates.
    * Dedicated 24/7 support.
    * Consent for commercial use.
    * Designed for Windows Vista, XP, and 2000.

Advanced WindowsCare Professional edition costs $29.95, which allows users to download and install Advanced WindowsCare Professional on up to 3 PCs per year. Actually there is also Advanced WindowsCare Personal that is available for free, but without support and automatic update, which can be downloaded from

But why settle for less when it&#039;s possible to use Advanced WindowsCare Pro for free for up to 1 year? My Digital Life reader David had sent in a tip where Chip.de magazine has offered its reader free 1-year license of Advanced WindowsCare Professional worth USD$29.95. It was special and exclusive promotion for Chip readers but now seems like everyone is sharing it.

To use the free license code and account for Advanced WindowsCare Pro, download and install the latest Advanced WindowsCare Professional hosted onThen use the following account name and license code to register the product.

Account Name: chip.de

License code: 85A945ED1F1A3DE3

The free license serial key is valid for 20,000 users apparently. It&#039;s unknown what will happen when the limit is hit. However, if you like Advanced WindowsCare Pro and would like to extend using it, Advanced WindowsCare Pro also available for free via TrialPay, but users will need to sign up for an offer from advertisers."
-http://www.mydigitallife.info/2008/03/19/advanced-windowscare-professional-edition-iobit-free-account-license-code/


I&#039;ve included the AWCPRO.exe and Registration.txt with Account Name/License Code.
All you need do is install, then input info!


Enjoy and Seed!
